definitions.definition: An entrenched or aggressive adherent to a particular cause, now especially a member of a particular ideological faction.
someone who supports the Trotskyist political view expressed in the newspaper Militant .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A soldier , a combatant . [17th–19th c.]
secondary_definitions: An entrenched or aggressive adherent to a particular cause, now especially a member of a particular ideological faction. [from 19th c.]
( specifically , communism ) someone who supports the Trotskyist political view expressed in the newspaper Militant . [from 20th c.]
